column1: '''TOL''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "stick out or up" or "stick up

column2: [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/elfling/message/32555 "Telerin in VT47 and elsewhere"] (message 32555; dated 18 October 2005) at [[Elfling]] (mailing list)</ref>/?[[Quenya]]<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]]

column1: In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] appears the root TOL<sup>2</sup>
In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root TOLO
column2: yielding a variety of derivatives (among them [[Qenya]] ''tolome'' "island" and ''tolda'' "hill with a flat top
